origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenBuildingAPI.analyze_trends', 'description': 'This function analyzes the development trends in the green building industry based on the specified time frame and data type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze, e.g., green_building.'}, {'name': 'time_frame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the analysis, e.g., one_year, six_months.'}, {'name': 'data_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data to analyze, e.g., market_research_reports, stock_performance.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'The analyzed trends in the green building industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenBuildingAPI.analyze_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'green_building', 'time_frame'是'one_year', 'data_type'是'market_research_reports'.
